Description: Primary key identifier for the survey definition
Title of the survey
Detailed description of the survey purpose and content
Sample Values: This survey is designed to collect data about family socioeconomic status using the Poverty Stoplight methodology

Description: Indicates if the survey definition is currently active
Unix timestamp of creation
Data Quality Checks: Valid Unix timestamp, Not in future

Description: Unix timestamp of last update
Reference to the terms and conditions for this survey
Data Quality Checks: Positive integer, FK validation to security.termcondpol

Description: Reference to the privacy policy for this survey
Data Quality Checks: Positive integer, FK validation to security.termcondpol

Description: Minimum number of priorities that must be selected
Data Quality Checks: Range check (0-10), NOT NULL if stoplight_type is not NULL

Description: Country code for which this survey is applicable
Data Quality Checks: ISO country code format, Length check (2)

Description: Default latitude for the survey location
Default longitude for the survey location
JSON array of labels or tags for the survey
Language code for the survey
Data Quality Checks: ISO language code format, Length check (2-5)

Description: Unique code identifier for the survey
Type of stoplight methodology used
Current status of the survey definition
Indicates if this is the current active version of the survey
Data Quality Checks: Boolean value check, Only one TRUE per survey_code

Description: Indicates if a disclaimer must be shown before taking the survey
Text content of the disclaimer
Sample Values: This survey collects personal information that will be used for...
Data Quality Checks: Required if disclaimer_required is TRUE, Length check (max 2000)

Description: Title of the disclaimer
Data Quality Checks: Required if disclaimer_required is TRUE, Length check (max 100)

Description: Subtitle of the disclaimer
Reference to the organization that owns this survey definition
Data Quality Checks: Positive integer, FK validation to ps_network.organizations

Description: Reference to the application (hub) this survey belongs to
Data Quality Checks: Positive integer, FK validation to ps_network.applications
